text: w often do you have dizziness or balance problems?  - Have you ever fallen?   - If so, when did you fall, where did you fall, and how often have you fallen? Tell your doctor as much as you can.  - What medications do you take? Remember to include all over-the-counter medicines, including aspirin, antihistamines, or sleep aids.   - What is the name of the medication?   - How much medication do you take each day?   - What times of the day do you take the medication?  - What is the health condition
